metadata.Title: CVE-2021-36057 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
XMP Toolkit SDK version 2020.1 (and earlier) is affected by awrite-what-where condition vulnerability caused during the application'smemory allocation process. This may cause the memory management functionsto become mismatched resulting in local application denial of service inthe context of the current user.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-36057` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

exempi - 2.6.1-2
libexempi8 - 2.6.1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: exempi package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6.1-2').
